name: Metallica
careerInformation: Metallica is  a American heavy metal band

name: Nirvana
careerInformation: Nirvana was an American rock band formed in Aberdeen, Washington in 1987

name: The Offspring
careerInformation: The Offspring is an American rock band from Garden Grove, California, formed in 1984.

name: The Chemical Brothers
careerInformation: The Chemical Brothers are an English electronic music duo[1] formed by Tom Rowlands and Ed Simons in Manchester in 1989.[2][3] They were pioneers (along with the Prodigy, Fatboy Slim, and other acts) in bringing the big beat genre to the forefront of pop culture.
